A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Dreadful\, awful\, boring\, overlong\, poor characters\, overly loud sound effects (no doubt to wake people slumbering through it). I just don't understand how anyone liked this tripe - unless they were paid to say so (which I strongly suspect to be the case). \n\nI so wish this was the last Jedi and hence the last Star Wars.
